user.title: Bosch eBike Setup
user.description: Connect your Bosch eBike with ConnectModule to Home Assistant. You will be redirected to Bosch to authenticate.

auth.title: Authenticate with Bosch
auth.description:
⚠️ **YOU MUST USE A DESKTOP/LAPTOP BROWSER** (Chrome, Firefox, Edge, Safari on Mac/PC)

**This will NOT work on mobile devices** - the Flow app will open and you won't see the code.

---

**Step 1:** Copy this URL and paste it into a **new browser tab** on your computer:

`{auth_url}`

**Step 2:** Log in with your Bosch Flow account credentials

**Step 3:** After logging in, the page will try to redirect and fail (this is normal!)

**Step 4:** Right-click anywhere on the error page and select **"Inspect"** or press **F12**

**Step 5:** Click the **"Network"** tab at the top

**Step 6:** Look for a request that starts with `onebikeapp-ios`

**Step 7:** Click on it and look at the URL. It will look like:
`onebikeapp-ios://...?code=ABC123XYZ`

**Step 8:** Copy ONLY the code part (the random letters/numbers after `code=`)

**Step 9:** Paste the code below:
